answerText: Joan Didion[10] This writer wrote about Hollywood and other aspects of Los Angeles life in his novels featuring Henry Chinasky, such as Factotum and Ham on Rye.
heading: DRAGOON |2013 | 12 | 12 | Literature | American | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This writer presented an account of the tension in discussing Ronald Reagan's mansion in the essay "Many Mansions." For 10 points each: [10] Name this author from California, some of whose essays can be found in The White Album.
